VoiceList.Entry: “Sorry!! Go speak to Captain Cid!”
“Tifa,thank you for a job well done!”
“Cid,thank you for a job well done!”
“Cloud,I was deeply moved by your story!”
“I'm really a weak person and so I could really understand how you feel,Cloud!”
“No one knows when fighting will begin. But let's get ready!”
“Thank you for a job well done!”
“Oh…oh… Cloud…”
“Your command?” (PHS) (SAVE) (HP/MP restored!)
Cloud “Everyone…I'm sorry. I don't know what to say…”
Red XIII “Don't say anything,Cloud. All you've been doing is apologizing.”
Cloud “I never was in SOLDIER.”
“I made up the story about what happened five years ago and my being in SOLDIER.”
“I left my village looking for glory, but never made it into SOLDIER…”
“I was so ashamed of being so weak. Then I heard this story from my friend Zack…”
“And I created an illusion of myself made up of what I had seen in my life…”
“And I continued to play the charade as if it were true.”
Barret “Illusion,huh? Pretty damn strong for an illusion.”
Cloud “Physically,I'm built like someone in SOLDIER.”
“Hojo's plan to clone Sephiroth wasn't that difficult.”
“It was just the same procedure they use when creating members of SOLDIER.”
Cloud “You see,someone in SOLDIER isn't simply exposed to Mako energy.”
“Their bodies are actually injected with Jenova cells…”
Cloud “For better or worse, only the strong can enter SOLDIER.”
“It has nothing to do with the Jenova Reunion.”
“But weak people…like me, get lost in the whole thing.”
Cloud “The combination of Jenova cells, Sephiroth's strong will, and my own weakness are what created me.”
“Everyone knew that. I'm…Cloud.”
Cloud “…the master of my own illusionary world.”
“But I can't remain trapped in an illusion anymore…”
“I'm going to live my life without pretending.”
Tifa “You're sure messed up,Cloud!”
Barret “That means he ain't no different from before!”
Cait Sith “By the way,Cloud. What are you going to do now?”
“Don't tell me you're going to leave the ship?”
Cloud “…I'm the reason why Meteor is falling towards us.”
Cloud “That's why I have to do everything in my power to fight this thing.”
Barret “Good!! Then you're gonna keep fightin' to save the Planet!?”
Cloud “It's like you always told me,Barret.”
Barret “Oh,uh,you mean that!”
Red XIII “What? I don't understand!”
“There ain't no gettin' offa this train we on!”
“There ain't no gettin' offa this train!”
“There ain't no gettin' offa this train!”
Tifa “Let's do it,Cloud!”
Cloud “Yeah…huff…heave…”
“Are you okay?”
Cloud “…I hate moving vehicles. I always get sick.”
“That's too bad…”
Cloud “But that's okay. That's the real me.”
“There ain't no gettin' offa this train!”
